item.description: SINGLES SPRING DANCE at Nuchie’s, 164 Central Street, Bristol from 8 pm to 12 am. We’ll dance the night away to the music of our great DJ – D&J Productions. There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm for you to enjoy. If you haven’t come to a dance in a while, this is the one to attend. Be sure to come and bring your friends. Dress to impress and door prizes. Admission $15 at door. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I 84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end and turn right, at 2nd light facility on right. Sponsored by Social Connections.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at the admission's table.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Spring Dance
